overview: Belladonna decided to bring eight of her most adventurous friends out to Big Bear Mountain for some all-girl sexual psychodrama in the heart of snow country! Trapped in a cabin with only a cameraman, multiple camcorders and each other, these pussy-crazed vixens were forced to use their wits (and other resources) to survive. . . and get each other off.
title: Belladonna's Road Trip: Cabin Fever
